content.description: Depending on how brave you feel, a stick clip may come in handy but it is easy climbing to the first bolt. After clipping the first bolt, the climb will transition onto the face and start to trend right. Utilize the arete to guide you towards the finish. The finish can be much harder depending on your beta. Enjoy the sympathy bolt at the top before the anchors (recommend an alpine on this bolt so it runs smoothly over the lip of rock). Full sun, wear sunscreen!
content.location: Start on the slab, just left of the roof (this is were the first bolt is).

content.description: New area being developed, varying rock quality, wear a helmet. The bottom of cliff may seep after rain.
